mapper.insert: insert into tb_movie(movie_id, title, release_date, plot, rating, director_nm, actor_nm, boxoffice_order, star_avg_rate, create_at, update_at) values(#{movie_id}, #{title}, #{release_date}, #{plot}, #{rating}, #{director_nm}, #{actor_nm}, #{boxoffice_order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{star_avg_rate}, to_char(sysdate), to_char(sysdate))
